sentences.en: A polygon with ten sides is a decagon.
sentences.cn: 十条边的形状叫十边形。

sentences.en: Three different planar structural modes of 5 approximants have been put forward by using pentagon, decagon, flat hexagon and boat-shape respectively.
sentences.cn: 从高分辨像出发，分别用十边形，五角形以及扁六边形和船形构筑了五种十次准晶近似相的各三种平面结构模型。
